title: AIAA Aircraft Design Competition 2025
description: Designing a next-generation regional transport aircraft for the annual AIAA Undergraduate Design Competition.
objective: Create a comprehensive aircraft design proposal addressing fuel efficiency, passenger comfort, and sustainability.

title: High-Power Rocketry Project
description: Building and launching a high-power rocket for the Spaceport America Cup competition.
objective: Design, build, and successfully launch a rocket to 10,000 feet with a scientific payload.

title: Autonomous Drone Navigation
description: Developing autonomous navigation capabilities for a custom-built quadcopter.
objective: Implement computer vision and path planning algorithms for autonomous flight in GPS-denied environments.

title: CubeSat Mission Concept
description: Conceptual design for a 1U CubeSat mission focused on atmospheric research.
objective: Develop a complete mission architecture including payload, power, and communications systems.
